Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. (Recreation) -- 3.02 Mills Continuation - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of St. Charles, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a three and two hundredths (3.02) mills tax on all property subject to taxation in said Parish (an estimated $3,793,400 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of constructing, improving, maintaining and operating recreation facilities and programs in said Parish, said millage to represent a five hundredths of a mill (.05) increase over the 2.97 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2017 pursuant to an election held on February 9, 2008?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. (Programs for the Elderly) -- 1 Mill - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions
(Programs for the Elderly Tax)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of St. Charles, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy and collect a special tax of one (1.00) mill on all property subject to taxation in said Parish (an estimated $1,256,100 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of constructing, improving, maintaining and operating facilities and programs for the elderly in the Parish through the St. Charles Council on Aging Incorporated, said millage to represent a two hundredths of a mill (.02) increase over the .98 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2017 pursuant to an election held on February 9, 2008?
